content: Write a song chorus where every line starts with a different letter of the alphabet in alphabetical order.

(Verse 1)
A brand new day is breaking, sun's rays peek through the trees,
Beneath the sky so vast and wide, where dreams and hopes are free.

(Chorus)
Alone in the crowd, big city lights,
Brave hearts beating, chasing dreams tonight.
Can't hold me back, destiny's my guide,
Dancing in the moonlight, under starry skies.

(Verse 2)
Every step I take, echoes in the night,
Feeling alive, with passion burning bright.
Gotta keep moving forward, no matter the cost,
Holding on to hope, when all seems lost.

(Chorus)
Alone in the crowd, big city lights,
Brave hearts beating, chasing dreams tonight.
Can't hold me back, destiny's my guide,
Dancing in the moonlight, under starry skies.

(Bridge)
Eager to soar, higher than the clouds,
Fighting for what I believe in, no doubts.
Glorious moments, waiting just around the bend,
Holding on tight, to the journey's end.

(Chorus)
Alone in the crowd, big city lights,
Brave hearts beating, chasing dreams tonight.
Can't hold me back, destiny's my guide,
Dancing in the moonlight, under starry skies.

(Outro)
So here's to the dreamers, the fighters, the brave,
Together we stand, in this ever-changing wave.
Unstoppable force, with hearts full of fire,
Victorious in spirit, forever aspire.

(Ending Chorus)
Alone in the crowd, big city lights,
Brave hearts beating, chasing dreams tonight.
Can't hold me back, destiny's my guide,
Dancing in the moonlight, under starry skies.
